SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.indexer.search.context

Class StrictLineBreakIterator

java.lang.Object
java.text.BreakIterator
org.opengrok.indexer.search.context.StrictLineBreakIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class StrictLineBreakIterator extends BreakIterator
Represents a subclass of BreakIterator that breaks at standard OpenGrok EOL -- namely \r\n, \n, or \r.
